abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has agreed to trade its 16.3 percent stake in the White Mountains Insurance Group for two subsidiaries and $751 million.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has agreed to trade its 16.3 percent stake in the White Mountains Insurance Group for two subsidiaries and $751 million.

headline.main: Buffett Swaps White Mountain Stake for Cash and Other Units
